author: Source: Keighleynews.co.uk
title: David Tennant goes breaking hearts as Kiki Dee for new Sky 1 show - Keighleynews.co.uk
text:
Former Doctor Who star David Tennant is kicking off Sky 1's latest show in style: dressed as Elton John's other half, Kiki Dee, from the duet Don't Go Breaking My Heart. Tennant joins Bring The Noise's host, Kaiser Chiefs frontman Ricky Wilson, who dons a wig and suit to portray Sir Elton.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Keighleynews.co.uk.
